title: I Want Jesus to Walk with Me

lyrics.text:
I want Jesus to walk with me. (walk with me) I want Jesus to walk with me. (walk with me)
All along my pilgrim journey, Lord, I want Jesus to walk with me. (walk with me)

In my trials, Lord, walk with me. (walk with me) In my trials, Lord, walk with me. (walk with me)
When my heart is almost breaking, Lord, I want Jesus to walk with me. (walk with me)

When I'm troubled, Lord, walk with me. (walk with me) When I'm troubled, Lord, walk with me. (walk with me)
When my head is bowed in sorrow, Lord, I want Jesus to walk with me. (walk with me)
